HomePage.inf_text: Hello, I’m Javohir, a fullstack developer. I’ve been improving my skills for about 2 and a half years. I work with Django, Rest Framework, FastAPI, and other Python web frameworks. I also have experience with Telegram bots, desktop apps, and other programming languages such as C#, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Although I haven’t worked much in teams, I have my own small projects. I’ve also explored Docker Containers, GitHub, 3D modeling, and Game Development. I have almost one year of experience in Linux administration as well.
HomePage.message: I am <name>"Javohir"</name> — a fullstack developer. My main interests are <skills>Robotics, IoT technologies, and Software Engineering</skills>.
HomePage.text3: Achievements I have made so far.
HomePage.react: A JavaScript library used for building user interfaces. It is known for its component-based structure, virtual DOM performance, and reusability.
HomePage.next: A powerful framework built on top of React, known for server-side rendering, routing, and optimized performance.
HomePage.python: A powerful and secure web framework written in Python. It provides rapid development, database integration, admin panel, and modularity.
